channel.title: Calendar on Dimitri Fontaine, PostgreSQL Expert
channel.description: Recent content in Calendar on Dimitri Fontaine, PostgreSQL Expert

item.title: PostgreSQL and the calendar
item.description: The modern calendar is a trap for the young engineer’s mind. We deal with the calendar on a daily basis and until exposed to its insanity it’s rather common to think that calendar based computations are easy. That’s until you’ve tried to do it once. A very good read about how the current calendar came to be the way it is now is Erik’s Naggum The Long, Painful History of Time.
